# Welcome to the Cloud Automation Workshop. Here are all important links you need today

We have a couple of things for you ...

## Online Excel 
In this [Online Excel](TRAINERTOADDLINK) you can claim your Workshop Tenant Id by putting your name in column A next to a not yet claimed Tenant.
We also use this Excel to keep track of Hands-On Status!

## Hands-On Instructions 
Supporting information for the Hands-On, e.g.: screenshots, copy/paste help ...

* Instructions on [GitHub](https://github.com/keptn-sandbox/keptn-on-k3s/blob/master/cloudautomation/INSTRUCTIONS.md)
* Instructions in [PowerPoint/PDF](https://github.com/keptn-sandbox/keptn-on-k3s/blob/master/cloudautomation/WorkshopHandsOnFORATTENDEES.pdf)

## Dynatrace Environments

* Dynatrace tenant: [{{ .dttenant }}]({{ .dttenant }})
* Cloud Automation tenant: [{{ .keptncontrolplane }}]({{ .keptncontrolplane }})

For both use a browser in *Incognito Mode* and login with 

* User: {{ .workshopuser }}
* Pass: {{ .workshoppwd }}

## Sample CI/CD to trigger automation

Instead of hosting a Jenkins, GitLab or Azure DevOps we created a [Simple Web Interface](http://keptnwebservice.keptnwebservice-production.{{ .keptnproductioningress }})
 allowing you to trigger Cloud Automation sequences just as your existing CI would do:

## Your sample / demo tenant app: Possible it is blocked by your Corporate Firewall (but thats not an issue)
We all have our own sample apps. They follow the same link name pattern. Only thing you need to do is replace XXXX with your tenantId, e.g: aapl, acer, ...

* Staging: [http://tnt-XXXX-svc.delivery-demo-staging.{{ .keptnstagingingress }}](http://tnt-XXXX-svc.delivery-demo-staging.{{ .keptnstagingingress }})

* Production: [http://tnt-XXXX-svc.delivery-demo-production.{{ .keptnproductioningress }}](http://tnt-XXXX-svc.delivery-demo-production.{{ .keptnproductioningress }})

Either use Zoom Chat, raise your hands (if you are in the room) or send me an email: {{ .owner }}
